response.overview: A balloon creature named Flipou falls from the sky into a forest clearing. Deflated, he discovers plants whose warmth makes him swell-only for the revived flora to freeze and fall inert after giving him life.
response.tagline: Follow the adventure of Flipou, a balloon creature who has fallen from the sky into a mysterious clearing, where strange encounters will turn her destiny upside down.
response.title: Flipou
